add a navbar with the navlinks home, about and contacrt

Throughout the conversation, the user and the AI discussed implementing various features for a project, focusing particularly on UI elements and functionality. Initially, the user requested the addition of a "Hello World" button. Following this, they were presented with a list of potential features to enhance the project, including a live feed to display the latest Ethereum transactions, a dynamic search bar to filter transactions, a real-time transaction updates ticker, and customizable dashboard widgets, among others. Also highlighted were user interface preferences, such as the inclusion of a sidebar with navigation links for home, about, and contact sections, and a real-time Ethereum transaction tracker. Key decisions required from the user involved the functionality and positioning of the "Hello World" button, the visibility and placement of the sidebar, and the specific features to implement from the suggested list, with options emphasizing aspects like search functionality, interactive charts, user authentication, transaction fee calculation, responsive design for mobile views, and a dark/light mode toggle. The conversation also touched on more detailed functionalities, such as transaction filter options, notification alerts for high-value transactions, and exploring detailed transactions on the Ethereum network. The AI sought further clarification on the project to better understand and implement the requested features.
